::Prowl::

Prowl nods, listening to the side effects and threats. It was ri=
sky, 
very risky, but his resolution didn't faulter. He was a bit thankful =

for Iris explaining the love thing to Iron Raptor, though. He knew 
she co=
uld be stubborn, and he might have had a bit more trouble.

He nods at Iris=
' last comment, his core proccessor beginning to alter 
his spark frequency=
. A lighheaded feeling passes through Prowl the 
procedure begins, but the =
Maximal ignores it.

"Ok, I'm all set," he says, picking up the monitor and=
 mounting Iron 
Raptor. He was nervious, but only because he might do somet=
hing wrong 
and hurt Iron Raptor, not because he might not come out of this=
 alive.
